subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: ST.-DENIS, France, Oct. 20 (AP) — South Africa won its second rugby World Cup on Saturday by beating the defending champion, England, 15-6, in a final in which all the points came on penalty kicks.
snippet: ST.-DENIS, France, Oct. 20 (AP) — South Africa won its second rugby World Cup on Saturday by beating the defending champion, England, 15-6, in a final in which all the points came on penalty kicks.
